targets.rawSql:
WITH base AS (
  SELECT to_timestamp(floor(extract(epoch FROM m.ingest_ts) / 300) * 300) AS bucket_ts,
         m.point_id,
         m.value_num
  FROM metric_sample m
  WHERE m.plant_id = ${plant_id:sqlstring}
    AND m.point_id IN (${inlet_point_id:sqlstring}, ${outlet_point_id:sqlstring})
    AND m.metric IN (${mean_metric_page:sqlstring})
    AND m.ingest_ts >= now() - interval '24 hours'
    AND m.ingest_ts <= now()
)
SELECT bucket_ts AS "time",
       avg(CASE WHEN point_id = ${inlet_point_id:sqlstring} THEN value_num END) AS "入口",
       avg(CASE WHEN point_id = ${outlet_point_id:sqlstring} THEN value_num END) AS "出口"
FROM base
GROUP BY bucket_ts
ORDER BY bucket_ts;

list.definition:
SELECT p.plant_id AS __value,
       COALESCE(NULLIF(btrim(p.plant_name), ''), p.plant_id) AS __text
FROM plant p
ORDER BY __text;
list.label: 水厂
list.name: plant_id
list.query:
SELECT p.plant_id AS __value,
       COALESCE(NULLIF(btrim(p.plant_name), ''), p.plant_id) AS __text
FROM plant p
ORDER BY __text;

list.definition: SELECT point_id FROM point WHERE plant_id = ${plant_id:sqlstring} AND point_type = 'inlet' ORDER BY point_id LIMIT 1;
list.name: inlet_point_id
list.query: SELECT point_id FROM point WHERE plant_id = ${plant_id:sqlstring} AND point_type = 'inlet' ORDER BY point_id LIMIT 1;

list.definition: SELECT point_id FROM point WHERE plant_id = ${plant_id:sqlstring} AND point_type = 'outlet' ORDER BY point_id LIMIT 1;
list.name: outlet_point_id
list.query: SELECT point_id FROM point WHERE plant_id = ${plant_id:sqlstring} AND point_type = 'outlet' ORDER BY point_id LIMIT 1;

list.definition:
WITH md_base AS (
  SELECT md.metric,
         COALESCE(NULLIF(btrim(md.display_name), ''), md.metric) AS metric_text
  FROM metric_dict md
  WHERE md.visible IS TRUE
    AND NULLIF(btrim(md.metric), '') IS NOT NULL
), md_named AS (
  SELECT metric,
         metric_text,
         COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY metric_text) AS text_dup_count
  FROM md_base
)
SELECT metric AS __value,
       CASE
         WHEN text_dup_count > 1 THEN metric_text || ' [' || metric || ']'
         ELSE metric_text
       END AS __text
FROM md_named
ORDER BY metric;
list.name: mean_metric_page
list.query:
WITH md_base AS (
  SELECT md.metric,
         COALESCE(NULLIF(btrim(md.display_name), ''), md.metric) AS metric_text
  FROM metric_dict md
  WHERE md.visible IS TRUE
    AND NULLIF(btrim(md.metric), '') IS NOT NULL
), md_named AS (
  SELECT metric,
         metric_text,
         COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY metric_text) AS text_dup_count
  FROM md_base
)
SELECT metric AS __value,
       CASE
         WHEN text_dup_count > 1 THEN metric_text || ' [' || metric || ']'
         ELSE metric_text
       END AS __text
FROM md_named
ORDER BY metric;
